overview: Matthew is never afraid of the dark because he has been surrounded by it all his life. He’s got eyes hiding everywhere: in his hands, in his feet and especially in his ears. This week, his mother and father are preparing a surprise for his birthday and he can hardly wait to find out what it is! Directed by Nicola Lemay, Private Eyes is a 3D stereoscopic animated adaptation of Gilles Tibo’s book for children published in 1999 by Éditions Soulières.
title: Private Eyes
